#summary Installation guide for Infrmarium
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Pre-requirements =

  # [http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp JDK 6 Update xx]
  # [http://tomcat.apache.org/download-60.cgi Tomcat 6.x zipeed core]
  # [http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/5.1.html#downloads MySQL Server 5.1] (Notice, that you can actually use any db you want but you must fix all necessary configuration files and pom.xml to do so. We will add a guide about this later.)
  # [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/release/ganymede/sr2 Eclipse 3.4 IDE for Java EE Developers]
  # [http://m2eclipse.sonatype.org/ m2eclipse plugin for eclipse]
  # [http://projectlombok.org/ Lombok plugin for elclipse]
  # Optional. [http://subclipse.tigris.org/ Subclipse plugin for eclipse]
  # Optional. [http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/gui-tools/5.0.html MySQL GUI Tools]

= Setting up environment =

  # Download, unpack/install all dependencies
    * Use UTF8 as default character set for MySql server
  # MySql server configuration:
    * Create new database 'infirmarium'
    * Add new DB user. Username: root; Password: root.
    * Assign all privileges for user 'root' in database 'infirmarium' (Not checked. All must work even without this step)
  # Checkout project from svn.
  # Run *clean install* goal on infirmarium project.
  # Run mvn *gwt:run* on infiramrium-client project to run.
